errors.gateway-required: Enter gateway address and/or select the interface through which the traffic will be transmitted

notifications.upload-error: Failed to load routes from a file

staticRoutes.description: Keenetic supports static routing for when you need to do manual configurations e.g. to access specific resources of your ISP or to other IP networks and nodes.

editor-popup.title: Static route parameters
editor-popup.description: Choose the route type and specify the destination host address. Enter the gateway IP address or select the interface through which the traffic will be routed.

hints.auto: Tick 'Add automatically' to apply this route when specified gateway is available.

uploader-subform.title: Load from file
uploader-subform.description:
Routes can be downloaded from a Windows OS .bat file.
An example of a .bat file command: route ADD 157.0.0.0 MASK 255.0.0.0 157.55.80.1
